data.title: Custom Neon® Live Show & DJ Neon Sign
meta_keywords: LED Neon lights for personal and business use
data.meta_description: Custom Neon® has worked with bands, DJ's, live show venues, gigging musicians, and performing artists, creating customized LED neon signs. See what we made & get yours.
data.text:
Custom Neon® Signs for Bands, DJ's & Live Shows

DJ Neon Signs | Band Neon Signs

Custom Neon creates high-quality LED neon signs that are easy to light up gigs and live shows for all performers. They are a great way to add colorful vibrancy to any event, giving it a fun and exciting atmosphere!

Check out just a few of the awesome LED neon signs and logos we designed for these amazing artists and their live music shows.

DJ Neon Sign

Snoop Dogg x Roobet

Snoop Dogg partnered with Roobet, playing a gig in Berlin to launch their exclusive game HotBox. The night was lit up with branded yellow and white neon signs, which make a statement placed up against a simple black backdrop. It’s displayed behind a DJ booth, where the rap legend played some of his greatest hits!

This was one of several signs Roobet has commissioned from us. They gave us this shoutout on Insta:

Images of Snoop Dogg captured by @shotbyrenata for roobet.

Dan.B Music @ Suck My Disco

Suck My Disco regularly holds live music events and they asked us to turn their logo into an LED neon sign. Their live shows feature local artists and DJs like Dan B, seen here rocking out behind the DJ booth, which is lit up by the aesthetic purple Custom Neon sign.

Order Your Custom Neon® Sign Now

Choose your text, font, color, and backboard, or use the quote form to send us your logo and artwork.

Custom Neon® Band Signs

Kilo Bravo

Kilo Bravo is a US-based alt-rock band. Traveling from show to show, they light up their gigs with an awesome band neon logo. Illuminated in white and red LED neon flex, it hangs behind their drummer, brightening up their set in vivid neon light.

For info on their upcoming shows, check them out on Instagram @kilobravomusic.

Alexandra John Music

Alexandra John is a brother and sister musical duo from Los Angeles. Custom Neon created a large band neon light for these musical twins. The blue neon sign is visible in many of their studio videos on Instagram.

Alexandra and John travel around with their Custom Neon sign, lighting their gigs in bright blue neon color.

Wild Riot

Based in LA, Wild Riot isn’t your average creatives collective. Their purpose is to foster a space where people can crack themselves open, come together, and create.

They ordered a bright red Custom Neon LED lighted sign of their logo. Purpose-designed to be hung or used with an acrylic stand, it's easily portable and is often seen on stage at their live shows.

Durry

Austin and Taryn make up the brother and sister indie-rock duo Durry. The Minnesota pair had a customized band neon sign created by Custom Neon to brighten up their gigs.

This custom-made neon sign features a pointed finger and thumb in a circle of our stunning yellow neon. Made to be easily transportable - their band's neon logo is an awesome piece of branded artwork to vibe up their stage shows.

ONE TWO TEN Music

ONE TWO TEN is a pop-rock band from Oklahoma City. Custom Neon lit up their logo and turned it into a vibrant neon sign for them to use at gigs and live performances, giving their shows a bright and colorful ambiance!

You can find out more about ONE TWO TEN @onetwotenmusic.

Jake Scott

Singer-songwriter Jake Scott has been called a pop maverick with a dynamic sound and timeless songwriting ability. The Arkansas native frequently tours, putting on live music shows in the US and internationally.

His team ordered a personalized Custom Neon stage sign. We lit up his name in bright white LED neon using a simple block font. The no-fuss look pairs well with Jake's down to earth style.

Live Music Show Neon Signs

Jukeboxers Duelling Piano Bar

Jukeboxers Duelling Piano bar is a late-night cocktail bar with a non-stop live music show where you choose the playlist! Lighting up the walls of their space is a customized LED neon sign of their name, ‘Jukeboxers,’ in a custom-designed font type and ice blue color, giving the space a soft neon glow.

iRock Your Party

iRock Your Party are three siblings who love to party and made it their career curating parties that are fun for everyone! Brightening up their Florida event space is one eye-catching neon logo sign, lit up in our white and red shades. The sign is fixed to a black statement wall, helping the sign to pop and stand out!

If you’re around Orlando and wanna party, head over to their Instagram to find out more @irockyourparty.

Neon Lights for Performers & Gigs

Karen from Finance

Karen from Finance is an award winning performer, and RuPaul’s Drag Race Down Under finalist. The Drag Queen's sell-out Cabaret show, Doing Time, featured a Custom Neon backdrop - a bespoke color changing LED neon sign.

We created a UV-printed RGB color-changing sign and color-changing LED neon poles. DMX controllers allowed Karen's team to synchronize the stage lighting with the RGB color of the sign and poles, creating an immersive audio-visual experience. You can find more photos and details of the portable stage sign here.

PB Backyard Comedy

PB Backyard Comedy offers epic comedy shows with a weekly lineup of home-grown and national talent.

We lit up their Nashville stage with a purple Custom Neon sign. Made to match the comedy club's logo, this LED neon sign ensures the PB Backyard Comedy Club gets a ton of love on the comedians' and audience members' socials because it's in every shot.

Making Your Own Custom Neon Signs

All of our light signs are made using LED neon, which offers a far more energy-efficient and long-lasting product. They come with your choice of installation kits: wall mounting, hanging or stands, depending on your style and how you plan to display or install your sign. Also included is a transformer compatible with your country, a remote control dimmer, and a black, white, or transparent cable, depending on your requirements.

Hang your Custom Neon Sign at your next gig. Because they are lightweight and portable, you can pack them up and take them on the road with you. Create your own neon sign for your music studio, music bar, or music party event. It's also a great piece of neon wall art for your studio and would make a real statement in your living space.

Whether it's your band name, logo, or DJ mixer neon sign, there is no limit to what Custom Neon can make for you.

More Custom Neon® Signs & Customers' Reviews
